name: Email Fetcher
description: Fetches emails from an IMAP server and returns their subject, date, sender, and text content.
author: Shinkai

imap_server.description: IMAP server hostname (e.g., 'imap.gmail.com'). Must be valid IMAP server

username.description: Email address or username for IMAP authentication

password.description: Password or app-specific password for IMAP authentication

port.description: IMAP server port number. Default: 993 for secure IMAPS connection

ssl.description: Use SSL/TLS for secure connection. Default: true (recommended)

from_date.description: Start date for email search in YYYY-MM-DD format. Optional filter

to_date.description: End date for email search in YYYY-MM-DD format. Optional filter

emails.description: Array of fetched emails with subject, date, sender, and content

date.description: Email sent timestamp in ISO 8601 format

sender.description: Sender's email address in RFC 5322 format

text.description: Plain text content of email body, with HTML tags removed

login_status.description: Login status: 'success' or error message if failed
